content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help.

Remember to take your time, do your research, and don't hesitate to reach out to multiple architects and designers. It's essential to find the right fit for your project, and it's okay to ask questions and seek multiple opinions.

Rachel's recommendations can be invaluable, as she's familiar with the local market and may have connections in the industry. Be sure to ask her about her experience with the contractors and designers she recommends.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. I'll be here to help.

**Best of luck with your weekend home project!**

May you find the perfect architect or designer to bring your vision to life, and may your project be a success!
